posts.post_title: Lot of 5 C46s for sale - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Evening Folks,

   Finally got around to pulling the duplicates out of my C46 set and have this lot of 5 to sell.  Take the whole lot for $65 shipped.


Regards,

Richard.


Thanks Steve.  Cards are sold.

Richard:

I'll take them.

Steve
